## Summary

For new data scientists there is a lot to consider when building a digital portfolio of work. 
This presentation is a collection of best practices and tips on which modes to use and 
how to use them for maximum effect. Here is a list of topics covered in the presentation: 

1. Why would you build a portfolio?
3. Leveraging GitHub effectively
4. Considerations for maintaining a blog
4. Using Twitter, StackOverflow, and LinkedIn
